## Description {#details}

The value for an entry in the symbol table of an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a>.

This is in a separate file, because <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> uses <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9f4cf9e4567dcf87070176a271b63e38">MCSymbolTableEntry</a> (see below) to reuse the name that is stored in the symbol table.

Definition at line 22 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsymboltableentry-h">MCSymbolTableEntry.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

### NextUniqueID {#a780367c73b768f312b9b440ab811a386}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::MCSymbolTableValue::NextUniqueID = 0">
The next <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> to dole out to an unnamed assembler temporary symbol with the prefix (symbol table key).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsymboltableentry-h/#l00028">28</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsymboltableentry-h">MCSymbolTableEntry.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MCSymbol&#42; llvm::MCSymbolTableValue::Symbol = nullptr</>}>
The symbol associated with the name, if any.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsymboltableentry-h/#l00024">24</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsymboltableentry-h">MCSymbolTableEntry.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Used {#a1e0f51ccf7e77ed2bedb5f5e8e68855c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::MCSymbolTableValue::Used = false">
Whether the name associated with this value is used for a symbol.

This is not necessarily true: sometimes, we use a symbol table value without an associated symbol for accessing NextUniqueID when a suffix is added to a name. However, Used might be true even if Symbol is nullptr: temporary named symbols are not added to the symbol table.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsymboltableentry-h/#l00035">35</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsymboltableentry-h">MCSymbolTableEntry.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
